body.name: GIGABYTE X670E AORUS PRO X (AM5/ LGA 1718/ AMD/ X670E/ EATX/ 5-Year Warranty/ DDR5/ Quad M.2/ PCIe 5.0/ USB 3.2 Gen2X2 Type-C/WiFi 7/ Intel 2.5GbE LAN/Q-Flash Plus/EZ-Latch Plus/Motherboard)
features: AMD AM5 Socket: Supports AMD Ryzen 7000 Series Processors
DDR5 Compatible: 4* DIMMs with ECC/Non-ECC Unbuffered Memory
Commanding Power Design: Digital Twin 16+2+2 Phases VRM Solution
Cutting-Edge Thermal Design: VRM Thermal Armor Advanced, M.2 Thermal Guard XL, M.2 Thermal Guard Ext., Noise Detection
Next Gen Connectivity: PCIe 5.0, Quad NVMe x4 M.2, Dual USB-C, BT 5.3
EZ-Latch Plus: PCIe 5.0 & M.2 Connectors with a Quick Release & Screwless Design

Fine Tuning Features: RGB FUSION, Supports Addressable LED & RGB LED Strips, Smart Fan 6, Multi-key for Reset/RGB Switch/Direct to BIOS/Safe Mode, Q-Flash Plus - Update BIOS without installing CPU, Memory, and GPU
body.description: 5-Year WarrantyAMD AM5 Socket: Supports AMD Ryzen 7000 Series ProcessorsDDR5 Compatible: 4* DIMMs with ECC/Non-ECC Unbuffered MemoryCommanding Power Design: Digital Twin 16+2+2 Phases VRM SolutionCutting-Edge Thermal Design: VRM Thermal Armor Advanced, M.2 Thermal Guard XL, M.2 Thermal Guard Ext., Noise DetectionNext Gen Connectivity: PCIe 5.0, Quad NVMe x4 M.2, Dual USB-C, BT 5.3EZ-Latch Plus: PCIe 5.0 & M.2 Connectors with a Quick Release & Screwless DesignFast Networking: Wi-Fi 7, Intel 2.5GbE LANDynamic Audio: ALC897Fine Tuning Features: RGB FUSION, Supports Addressable LED & RGB LED Strips, Smart Fan 6, Multi-key for Reset/RGB Switch/Direct to BIOS/Safe Mode, Q-Flash Plus - Update BIOS without installing CPU, Memory, and GPU. A new era is here. The X670E AORUS PRO X supports AM5 Processors and features unparalleled performance. GIGABYTE X670 motherboards come with upgraded power design, high grade storage standards, and outstanding connectivity that enables you to optimize your performance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 12 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best AM5 board at the $300 price range!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a PC builder. I don't always order from Amazon for customer bulds. I've had no choice on this one as no white units where available locally. This is hands down my favorite board to work with. Quick swap NVMe slots are SO nice to have!White PCB! 😍The VRMs are very well contacted under each heat sync, runs cooler than other AM5 X670 boards I've tested by a couple C°.DDR5 memory training was about twice as fast as almost all other boards tested, regardless of ram speed and timing. Absolutely zero stability issues whatsoever! That vast majority of CPUs used in most bulbs are 7800x3D & 7700x, all of which seem to boost over advertised clocks speeds at factory settings on this board.This motherboard is absolutely great!!I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a solid board, especially for white build!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t post properly with a GPU in the x16 slot. It also was acting funny with the m2 A slot. It worked for like 4 hours then it bricked somehow. Disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing motherboard, looks great
reviews.reviewText: Motherboard works great. Didn’t have any issues booting without updating bios using 7800X3D 6000mhz RAM. I toggled XMP right away and it runs like a champ! I don’t know why people have had so many issues. My computer booted right away. Love the motherboard and haven’t had any problems with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars F20 Bios works
reviews.reviewText: F21 Bios was a nightmare but F20 is stable and solid, using with 7800X3D, Trident z 6000 CL30 and 4090. Let’s be honest most people are going to buy this because it’s white. Very happy after rolling back Bios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what the doctor ordered
reviews.reviewText: The board itself is beautiful and feels very well made. I had no problems installing the board in a full Tower. The first boot took 30 seconds or so and everything was recognized in the bios right away. I flashed the bios to its newest version and installed windows. Memory runs solid at 6000mt/s. My only complaint are the high prices of these boards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WIRELESS IS ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH WINDOWS 11.This board was the best looking white board available and I was optimistic that the WiFi/Bluetooth issues weren't common enough to be an issue. Well here we are, I've spent hours troubleshooting and this board simply will not even recognize that Bluetooth devices or wifi connections exist. Incredibly disappointed, will not be purchasing another Gigabyte product after this. I expected better from a $300 board, not outdated i225 LAN drivers (last updated Aug of 2022). So much potential wasted because they wanted to cheap out on wireless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
